author: Joseph Young
title: 3 Reasons a Coronavirus Second Wave Threatens China & South Korea
description: China and South Korea passed the peak of coronavirus. The risk of a second wave of the virus remains, and precautions cannot be softened. The post 3 Reasons a Coronavirus Second Wave Threatens China & South Korea appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• China may see new coronavirus cases due to existing patients testing positive again.
  • South Korea is seeing new cases as a result of foreign nationals entering the country for treatment.
